title: Surrounded by Flowers
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>What a cute drink~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah! The pink chocolate pieces look like cherry blossoms, don’t they?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Mhmm. It puts me in the mood for flower viewing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Wanna go to a flower viewing while drinking this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Why not! Wait, are there even cherry blossoms around here...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>There’s a park just a short walk away. Plus, look! There are dandelions and white clovers blooming along the path! We’re already doing some flower viewing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hehe, you’re right. Did you ever make crowns with white clovers when you were a kid?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I did! That brings back memories~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>...Wanna try making them again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I was just about to say that! Let's make them~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
